casebody.data:
Emily L. Hoffbauer v. Blankfort-Plehn-Katz, Inc., and Others. Emily L. Hoffbauer v. Mary Katz and Others.

Motion granted upon plaintiff’s posting a surety company bond to pay the costs provided for in the judgments appealed from and costs upon the appeal. Present — Finch, P. J., Merrell, McAvoy, Martin and Sherman, JJ.
